resources.string: The resoluton in pixels is %sx%s px
The resoluton in dp is %sx%s dp
Thanks for reporting. In the future I intend to gather this information on some server but this is first iteration so it was just displayed on the screen.

When working with xml views (or rarely in compose) I used to wonder what resource bucket my device belongs to? Is it mdpi/xxhdpi or â€¦? I know you can calculate it based on inches and resolution. But isn\'t simpler to launch this app???
